data.name: Unmatched: Digital Edition
data.detailed_description:
In Battle The Are No Equals!

Unmatched: Digital Edition is an adaptation of a critically acclaimed board game where two (or more) opponents command characters from myth, history, or fiction in a battle for the ages! Have you ever wondered who would win - King Arthur (aided by Merlin) or sword-wielding Alice (from Wonderland)? How would Sinbad and his band of ne'er-do-wells fare against Medusa and the three Furies? The answers to those questions, and more, can be found with a quick game of Unmatched!

What is Unmatched?

Unmatched: Digital Edition is a tactical game where two opponents command their Hero and their Sidekick(s) on a set battlefield. The rules are simple. The actions are within the contained decks of cards, and the replayability is immense!

  • Each player has to perform two actions a turn.
  • Actions are: move and draw a card, attack or play a power (called scheme).
  • Attacking (and defending) and using schemes is done with cards.
  • Some attacks and schemes can only be used by either your Hero or their sidekick.
  • When your Heroine (or Hero) drops to 0 health you lose the game.

Every Hero (or Heroine) has their unique ability, movement characteristic, and total health points set. The sidekick(s) can either have their own health pool or be weak one-hit-KO chaff (and probably can be resummoned to the battlefield).

What makes Unmatched great?

Unmatched is one of those easy-to-learn games with an incredible amount of depth. The tactical insight and knowledge of your (and your opponent's) Hero will determine the outcome of every fight. The individual games will be quick - but they will all be different as well! The greatest strength of Unmatched is its tactical depth - your decisions will be crucial - and the randomness factor is minimized and can be controlled further with players' skill.

What can you expect?

  • ⚔️ Epic duels between the most unlikely opponents
  • 🎨 Stunning artwork by Mondo Games
  • ♾️ Near infinite replayability
  • 📜 Easy ruleset
  • ♟️ Huge tactical depth
  • 🧠 Easy to learn, hard to master
  • 👩‍🎓 In-game tutorial and rulebook
  • 🌐 Online multiplayer
  • ⌛ Synchronous and asynchronous game modes
  • 🦾Three levels of AI for solo play
  • 🖌️ Official Unmatched rules consulted with the designers of the boardgame
  • 🔜 Multiple expansions to come - bringing new heroes and maps
  • 💻 Unique experience of a board game with the convenience of a digital platform

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677980/Unmatched_Digital_Edition/

data.short_description: Unmatched: Digital Edition is a highly asymmetrical game of card-driven battles between epic heroes from story and myth. ⚔️ Witness clashes you've never seen before in duels or team fights. 💥 In battle, there are no equals! 💥
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
